headline: GTA Online Update
subtitle: Introducing the New Benefactor Panto
content:
The giant German carmaker's leap into the micro market. Designed for the narrow, parking space deprived roads of Europe, this is sure to stick out on the eight lane freeways and mile-wide parking lots of Los Santos, until you get crushed by an SUV driven by an over-medicated housewife.

Available for purchase now from SouthernSanAndreasSuperAutos.com and featured in the new 'Iâ€™m Not a Hipster' Race: 'Before It Was Cool'.
